Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Hshurha]{Hshurha}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Nurgal]{Nurgal}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Trelmarixian]{Trelmarixian}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ymeri]{Ymeri}
Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Parch]{Parch}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dust Storm]{Dust Storm}
You have the power to dry and crumble what opposes you.
name: Dust Domain
